game_number.sentence: Ryan finished 17-of-28 for 195 yards, 4 touchdowns and 2 interceptions.

1.comment: Todd Herremans and was forced out of the game. Once that happened, Ryan seemed to gain confidence and shredded Philadelphia's tired defense with the no-huddle. Ryan finished 17-of-28 for 195 yards, 4 touchdowns and 2 interceptions. The Falcons need to employ the no-huddle offense much more often. It was really night and day once Atlanta switched to this attack.    Two of Ryan's scores went to Herremans and was forced out of the game.
